hero.title: About Shikshanam
hero.subtitle: We are dedicated to preserving and sharing the timeless wisdom of ancient India through modern technology and innovative learning methods.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Shikshanam was born from a deep reverence for India's ancient knowledge systems. We believe that the wisdom of Sanskrit, Darshanas, and traditional self-help practices holds the key to personal growth and spiritual development in the modern world.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to make this profound knowledge accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or location, through carefully crafted courses, interactive tools, and expert guidance.
mission.visionText: To create a global community of learners who embrace ancient wisdom for modern living, fostering personal growth, cultural understanding, and spiritual development.
